name: Going Bananas - Joe Jones & Ding Dong in a Tree jump adventure
name_original: Going Bananas - Joe Jones & Ding Dong in a Tree jump adventure
description:
Follow our hero Joe Jones as he tries to recover his stolen gold from that pesky ape Ding Dong, in a high speed tree climbing jungle adventure. You will have to avoid flaming bananas being hurled at you from Ding Dong and the perilous dangers of the jungle; such as large gaps in the trees you are climbing and man eating monster plants. Don't worry there are bonus boosters along the way to help you get your gold back as you climb to victory.

** “#1 tree climbing; banana dodging; coin collecting game in the world!” **
** "This game is wicked awesome!" **
** "The action doesn't end. Bonuses keep you in the game when it hits high speeds." **
** "Very Addictive." **

GOING BANANAS

Key features:
• Endless action
• Vivid cartoon look and feel
• Adorable Ape that you’ll love to hate!
• Easy to play, hard to play awesome
• Constant free updates with new game play innovations

ALREADY A FAN? Like the Ding Dong & Joe Jones on Facebook or follow them on Twitter for all the latest monkey gossip.
